name: Eight Paths
description:
Eight Paths and multiplayer board game whose objective is to master the maximum possible areas and gain as many points in 25 turns.

Rules:

  1. In the final round, the player with the most points is the victory!
  2. Move to any square to capture it.
  3. A move per turn.
  4. When moving to a square occupied by another token, there is a 50% chance of sending it back to your starting point or suffer the same fate.
  5. The maximum number of shifts and 25.
  6. A red or blue flag to indicate whose turn it is.
  7. Cassa nutras grants 1 point. Cassas previously captured by the opponent gives 2 points.

Credits:

  • Concept and Design: Marcelo Melo
  • Game Design and Programming: Saulo Daniel
